1.2.0.name: wordpress/dexs-extended-notepad-widget
1.2.0.description:
Hello and Welcome! Thanks for your support and for 760 Downloads and for 1 x 5-stars <3.

Stable Version

A stable bug-free version that should be updated urgently. We work on the new version 1.3.0 and this version will contains MORE features in a new simple and more minimalist design. Smart, simple and directly on your WordPress Dashboard.

What is the Dexs Extended Notepad Widget?

Simple: A note system, packaged in a widget, directly on your WordPress Dashboard Interface.

Support

So you can contact us.

  • Twitter: @PytesDev
  • FaceBook: Coming Coon
  • eMail: sambrishes@gmx.net
  • Web: Coming Soon
  • WordPress.org: Support-Section

Features

  • Write, Edit, Save, Delete and Protect your Notes.
  • Pin a no
